name: Turnersville Christian Mission
description: Turnersville Christian Mission is a volunteer-based homeless mission dedicated to spreading the love of Christ to everyone in need. The mission operates solely on donations and does not accept government grants or pay any staff members. They provide essential services including emergency shelter for those without a place to stay, food assistance, shower facilities, and spiritual support. The mission serves as a beacon of hope in the community, offering a safe haven for individuals experiencing homelessness while providing them with basic necessities and Christian fellowship.
source: Verified from Google Business listing, Facebook page, and multiple online sources
notes: Volunteer-run organization. No staff receives pay. Operates solely on donations. Does not accept government grants.
eligibility: Open to anyone in need of shelter or assistance
